content: Back in NYC, the skyline feels both familiar and strange. Japan's got me thinking, how can I merge my love for tech with the vibrant energy of this city?

content: Just spent the last few days trying to adapt my trading algorithms to the fast pace of NYC. The city's rhythm is different, and so are the markets here. Time to recalibrate.
